about_the_game:
Embark on a journey post 'The Collision'. Follow Lauren's quest for civilization after losing her love in this narrative adventure.

Embark on a captivating journey through Getting There, a narrative game that weaves a tale of resilience and discovery. Step into the shoes of Lauren, a survivor in a world transformed by the enigmatic "Collision." Alongside her partner Kirsten, they found solace amidst the chaos, until Kirsten's affliction led to a heart-wrenching moment.

As Lauren starts her van, a familiar boradcast fills the airwaves from Cape Faith. With a determined spirit, she sets out on a road trip towards Cape Faith, a suposed beacon of hope in this altered world.

Getting There invites you to explore a world where beauty and adversity coexist, guiding Lauren through moments of introspection, growth, and connection. Discover the stories that unfold, the characters that shape Lauren's journey, and the destinations that promise both answers and new beginnings.

Features
  • Stunning visuals: Immerse yourself in a visually captivating world.
  • Emotional storytelling: Experience a deeply moving narrative that tugs at the heartstrings.
  • Branching paths: Shape the outcome of the story through your choices and decisions.
  • Atmospheric soundtrack: Immerse yourself in a captivating musical score

content_descriptors.notes: There is a scene of implied suicide

name: Getting There

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 3300X/Intel Core i3-6320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: On-board
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headphones Recommended, Gamepd Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Getting There is a narrative adventure game telling the story of the world after what is only known as The Collision. After the death of her lover Kirsten, Lauren gets in her van and journeys across the strange and quiet world in search of civilisation.
